name: Officer Gun: Cleaning up the Streets
name_original: Officer Gun: Cleaning up the Streets
description:
This is my submission for the GMTK 2020 Gam Jam!

You start off as a police officer with just a pistol, but things get out of control and you lose the ability to stop shooting and turn into a gun-hoarding maniac!

Controls: 

W,A,S,D: Movement

Q,E: Previous/Next Weapon

R: Manual Reload

Shift: Sprint
